statements: SELECT id, employee_id, salary FROM business_information WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT * FROM business_information WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM business_information WHERE salary > 50000 AND salary < 80000
SELECT id, department_id, hire_date FROM business_information WHERE department_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY hire_date ASC
SELECT * FROM business_information WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, employee_id, salary FROM business_information ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM business_information WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC
SELECT id, hire_date, last_updated FROM business_information WHERE department_id = 5
SELECT employee_id, department_id FROM business_information WHERE salary > 50000 AND hire_date < '2020-06-01'
SELECT MAX(salary) AS max_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary FROM business_information
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, log_id, log_timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, action_taken FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.log_timestamp, a.action_taken FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, username FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM sensitive_data WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action IN ('login', 'logout');
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, role FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT DISTINCT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.manager_id;
SELECT permission_name, SUBSTRING(description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessUsers;
SELECT username, email, role FROM BusinessUsers WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, account_number, balance, currency FROM FinancialData WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, backup_time, size_mb FROM DataBackups WHERE size_mb > 100 ORDER BY backup_time;
SELECT * FROM BusinessUsers;
SELECT id, username, email FROM BusinessUsers WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM FinancialData ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM AccessLogs WHERE action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM AuditTrail WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
